me dawaswala jalaye menma samajayeth ithama katha bahata lakwela thiyana karana dekak thamayi samalingika prashnaya ha mathdrawya wala mila ihala yama.balu balmatanan ekineka samana kamak na wage thamayi.me lagadi api yaluwo tikak ekathu unama anan manan katha kara kara ididdi oya ganath katha wena athare mage eka yaluwek podi kathawak kiwwa,habayi wadihitiyanta pamanayi kiyala matanan anthimedi baninna epa..!meka lankawen nan nemeyi aaranchi wela thiyenna,borunan kiyolama balanna,magak dura yaddi thereyi kohomatawath lankawe nemeyi kiyala.mekayi kathawa!adu wayase gatawu dennek horen mathdrawya pilibada athdakimak laba ganna yaddi mattu wela,polisiyen usawiya dakwama gihilla.anthimedi demapiyan genwala kad eka hodatama kudu karala,dan nadukara unnansege lasthiya daduwama dennalu.oya wage palamu waradi walata wadiya loku daduwam denne na ne.ithin meyalata dunna daduwama thamayi sathiyak athulath dumbime aadinawa gana samajaya danuwath karala anthimedi kidenekwa mathin mudewwadayi pragathiya pennanna ona.ithin komahari sathiyakata passe dennawa kadawala nadukaraya ahanawalu eka ekkenage pragathiya.palaweniya awilla bod ekak ehema allala eke loku rawumakuyi podi rawumakuyi andalu,andala kiwwalu mama 22denekwa mathin midewwa kiyala.ethakota nadukarathuma itha sathutata path wela ahuwalu "ee kohomada putha,poddak pahadili karanna kiyala"."mehemayi, man me rawum deka pennala kiwwa me lokuwata thiyenne mathdrawya pawichchiyata pera molaya ha podiyata thiyenne mathdrawya pawichchiyata pasu rogi wu molaya kiyala"nadukaraya bohoma sathutu wela anith buwa desata haruna.anika loka andaya,uu sathiya purama melo wadak karala na,habayi poddak wela kalpana karapu buwa kiwwa "mama sathiya purama 100kata wada kattiyawa mathin midewwa"kiyala.nadukaraya pudumayatath sathutath path wela ahuwa "harima santhosayi putha..ee kohomada?"kiyala.kelinma ara anith koluwa anda rawum deka athata gaththa me koluwa eek anith paththa harogena mehema kiyanawalu!"mama meka aran hamotama pennala mehema kiwwa,me podi rawumen penne ganja gahala ahuwela hireta yanna issella passa ( gudaya..gudaya..),loku rawumen penne gihilla aawata passe passa paththa"kiyalanadukarayata apath nalu!!!

jalaja pakshihu da ee asala bahulaya.dolfin bahulawa balimata ya yuthuma thana kalpitiyayime siyalu dupathwala sancharaka prawardhana katayuthu kriyathmaka kirimata api adiyara kipayak yatathe salasum kara thibenawa.aarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha mahathage meheyawima matha merata wishalathama sancharaka wyapruthiya kalpitiya aashrithawa pihituwanawa” kalpitiya eekabaddha sancharaka nikethana sanwardhana wyapruthiye kalamanakara saman nawarathna mahatha pawasiya.mulu wyapruthiye sampurna watinakama koti 7000 yi.

puraththanabhimukho, padum dasata giya muhunu athiye; suriye anaththepimukhe, padum dasata giya muhunu athiye; suriye anaththasamitheyewa, no passena 1 hiru 10 hime; pubebathiwasanyanan, ayubhawa sikarana pubeba nichasnyana;chuthupapakanyanan, ruwa aramunu alukarana diwasaknyana; pachchayakare, dhamun dhamnata pawasana aarehi- patan pawurunehi naguna pas pachchayakara nam; dasabala, tatha tana nyanabala aa dasabala; chathuwesarajja, sabbanyanyu baw jananabawu thiyena dham janana bawu antharayi kuru dham jananabawa yana me sathara thanhi wisaru bawu chathuwesarajja nama aadi gahanin aawenikadham aa ganne.
